title: This provision shall not apply to redevelopment of individual bungalows in Bungalow Scheme
clause_text: This provision shall not apply to redevelopment of individual bungalows in Bungalow Scheme. However, this provision shall be applicable if redevelopment in Bungalow Scheme or plot having area more than 4000 sq. m. under layout is proposed,
